Html:
Hi Simon,

We are very interested in your HtmlAgilityPack. We have already try it and this module is very helpful for us.

Now we are creating a freeware/shareware software with a lot of features. One of its features is based on HTML parsing (it loads parameters from HTML). So, we want to include some parts of the 'HtmlAgilityPack' into our software.

And we want to know, what limitation does we have?

Best regards,
MPP Software Limited
(mppsoftwareltd@gmail.com)
